label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_011
content:
## 2026-01-13 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /dns-query: REQUESTS 21950 req | p50: 17.5ms p95: 42.0ms p99: N/A | err: 0.07% (15 errors) | success: 99.93%
- /zone-transfer: REQUESTS 240 req | p50: 520ms p95: 1200ms p99: N/A | err: 0% (0 errors) | success: 100%
- /dnssec-sign: REQUESTS N/A req | p50: N/A ms p95: N/A ms p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A
- /health-check: REQUESTS N/A req | p50: N/A ms p95: N/A ms p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A
- /config-change: REQUESTS 6 req | p50: N/A ms p95: N/A ms p99: N/A | err: 0% (0 errors) | success: 100%
- /cache-status: REQUESTS N/A req | p50: N/A ms p95: N/A ms p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A

### Infrastructure
- bind-master-01: CPU 30% | Mem 62% | Disk 74% | Conns: 1270 | Net: 80/112 Mbps
- bind-slave-02: CPU 23% | Mem 50% | Disk 56% | Conns: 1058 | Net: 60/76 Mbps
- cloud-dns-sync-01: CPU 48% | Mem 67% | Disk 50% | Conns: N/A | Net: 96/132 Mbps
- signer-01: CPU 35% | Mem 72% | Disk 61% | Conns: N/A | Net: 16/20 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- pool-dns-queries: active 150 | idle 30 | waiting 5 | exhaustion 0 | max 200 | avg_wait 12ms
- pool-zone-transfers: active 10 | idle 2 | waiting 1 | exhaustion 0 | max 15 | avg_wait 25ms
- pool-signing: active 1 | idle 0 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 2 | avg_wait 5ms
- pool-monitoring: active 3 | idle 0 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 5 | avg_wait 8ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 88.4% | Bandwidth: 2.5 Gbps | Origin requests: 3200

### Alerts
- [INFO] DNSSEC signature refresh on zone example.com: 120 signatures refreshed
- [WARNING] Stale answer percentage at 0.3% on edge sites
- [ERROR] Bogus validation event detected in DNSSEC validation
- [CRITICAL] Propagation delay at cloud edge site 12: 158s
- [INFO] TTL change applied to 8 zones, 62 records updated
- [INFO] Change requests processed: 6, all applied successfully
- [INFO] Negative cache hit rate: 39%
- [INFO] Resolver cache hit rate: 88.4%
- [INFO] Propagation average time: 66s
- [INFO] Propagation 95th percentile: 158s
- [INFO] Zone transfers AXFR requests: 34, success 100%
- [INFO] Zone transfers IXFR requests: 206, success 99%
- [INFO] AXFR failures: 0
- [INFO] IXFR failures: 2
- [WARNING] TTL min: 300s, max: 43200s, median: 3600s
- [INFO] DNS queries peak QPS: 51800
- [INFO] DNS queries average QPS: 21950
- [INFO] NXDOMAIN percentage: 2%
- [INFO] SERVFAIL percentage: 0.05%
- [INFO] UDP query percentage: 97%
- [INFO] TCP fallback percentage: 1.3%
- [INFO] DNSSEC zones signed: 64
- [INFO] Signature refreshes: 120
- [INFO] Signing queue depth: 1
- [INFO] DS mismatch count: 0
- [INFO] Bogus validation events: 1
- [INFO] Zonefile lint errors: 3
- [INFO] Authority reachability: 99.99%
- [INFO] Lame delegation count: 0
- [INFO] SOA serial mismatch: 0
- [INFO] Dynamic updates per hour: 320

### Events
- Migrated 16 zones with DNSSEC enabled from day one; verified DS publishing order and validated from external resolvers.
- Adjusted monitoring to include per-zone propagation SLO and stale answer sampling; initial baselines captured.
- Removed legacy allow-transfer ACL entries on BIND master for retired slaves; confirmed no unintended AXFR blocks for cloud endpoints.
- Reviewed negative caching behavior; tuned SOA minimum values for 5 zones to reduce prolonged NXDOMAIN caching after record creation.

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: P. Singh. 1 pages. 5 tickets. Status: Stable; successful DNSSEC-enabled migrations and improved monitoring coverage.
